question: Who has become the first Indian girl to explore the route from Sea Link near Worli Koliwada to the Gateway of India?
explanation: Gauri Singh (14) from Rajasthan has become the first Indian girl to explore the route from Sea Link near Worli Koliwada to the Gateway of India. She took over 6 hours 30 minutes to complete the 36 km long distance route. Singh is a resident of Udaipur and a class 8th student.
